actions.name: spawner
actions.description: Spawns an object when the zone is entered

attributes.name: object_url
attributes.description: URL to JSON that describes what to spawn

attributes.name: position_uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the entity to spawn the object at

attributes.name: lifetime
attributes.description: How long the entity should exist after being spawned (sec, -1 for none)

actions.name: sound
actions.description: Plays a sound when the zone is entered

attributes.name: audio_url
attributes.description: URL to audio file to be played

attributes.name: position_uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the entity to play the sound at

actions.name: custom_tree_grow
actions.description: A custom script used in a video for comicon

attributes.name: position_uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the entity to place the tree at
